sentences: Japans Minister of State and Director General of the Environment Agency, Sukio Iwadare, thanked the COP for its decision to take up his countrys offer to host and cover the costs of COP-3 in Kyoto, Japan, from 1-12 December 1997.
He said much remains to be done if a protocol or other legal instrument is to be adopted at COP-3.
The meeting will be a significant step forward to the construction of an economy and society that place less of a burden on the environment.
His delegation supported agreement on an effective legal instrument at COP-3.
enb_long_title: Second Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
